result.purpose: Responsible for integrating with Moonpay services, including configuration and URL signing.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating configuration and service logic related to Moonpay integration.

pkg/moonpay/config.go.purpose: Defines configuration structure for Moonpay integration.

pkg/moonpay/service.go.purpose: Provides a service for signing URLs using HMAC and base64 encoding.
